title: Morning Minute: Western Union Chooses Solana for Stablecoin
contentSnippet: Headlining a blockbuster day for Solana, which has a record-setting debut for its shiny new staking ETF as well.

title: Australian Regulator Signals Broader Digital Asset Oversight Ahead of New Licensing Regime
contentSnippet: ASIC said many digital assets are covered by existing financial laws as it readies the ground for impending digital asset platform legislation.

title: SDNY Judge Denies OpenAI Bid To Strike Authors' Book-Download Claim
contentSnippet: Artificial intelligence firms OpenAI, Meta, and Anthropic all face copyright lawsuits as courts weigh fair use in AI training.

title: Ironlight Wins FINRA Approval for First U.S. Regulated ATS With Onchain Atomic Settlement
contentSnippet: The firm gained approval to introduce a regulated trading system for tokenized securities.

title: Crypto Markets Today: Bitcoin Consolidates at $113K Ahead of Potential U.S.-China Trade Deal
contentSnippet: The crypto market paused midweek as traders looked to the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate call and progress on a potential U.S.-China trade agreement.

title: Memecoin Tied to CZ Statue Crashes 99% After Binance Founder Disowns It
contentSnippet: A Washington, D.C. statue of Changpeng “CZ” Zhao became the center of a memecoin frenzy after the “czstatue” token surged 27,000% in a day before collapsing to near zero.

title: Core Scientific Holders Poised to Reject CoreWeave Merger, Jefferies Says
contentSnippet: The bank said investors are likely to vote down the deal on Oct. 30, betting Core Scientific can create more value on its own.

title: Bitcoin holds near $113,000 ahead of FOMC as traders await Powell’s guidance
contentSnippet: BTC floated near $113,000 before the FOMC, with traders awaiting Powell’s remarks as ETF inflows and macro tailwinds support prices.

title: Stablecoin Inflows Rise Before Fed Rate Decision: Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Oct. 29, 2025

title: How Dollar Breakouts Have Nailed Bitcoin Peaks: Is Another Top in the Works?
contentSnippet: Historical precedent suggests potential U.S. dollar strength could trigger another Bitcoin top, but an analyst says otherwise.

title: Grayscale debuts Solana staking ETF, as crypto firms push ahead despite government shutdown
contentSnippet: Grayscale Investments is the latest firm to launch an exchange-traded fund tracking the price of Solana and including staking.

title: Bitcoin, Ether Brace for $17B Options Expiry Amid Fed Meeting, Tech Company Earnings
contentSnippet: Traders eye potential volatility as bitcoin hovers near max pain around $114,000 and ether nears $4,000.

title: Bitwise spot Solana ETF draws $69.5 million on debut as new HBAR and Litecoin funds see zero flows
contentSnippet: Bitwise's BSOL generated $57.9 million in volume on its first trading day — the most of any ETF launch this year.

title: Deutsche Digital Assets and Safello to List Staked Bittensor ETP on SIX Swiss Exchange
contentSnippet: The exchange-traded product offers investors regulated access to Bittensor’s TAO token with staking rewards and full physical backing.

title: DBS, Goldman Sachs Execute First Over-the-Counter Interbank Crypto Options Trade
contentSnippet: DBS said the deal involved trading cash-settled OTC bitcoin and ether options.

title: World Liberty Financial to Airdrop 8.4M WLFI Tokens to Early USD1 Users
contentSnippet: The Trump-backed stablecoin project is rewarding early adopters through its USD1 points program, distributing tokens across six exchanges as it expands into DeFi and real-world asset integrations.

title: Stable to launch Phase 2 of pre-deposit campaign next week
contentSnippet: The announcement drew negative feedback on X, with users claiming large holders had executed deposits in Phase 1 before the public opening.

title: Ethereum ICO participant moves $6 million in ETH after 8-year dormancy: onchain data
contentSnippet: The investor participated in Ethereum's 2014 ICO and received 20,000 ETH for about $6,200, Lookonchain reported.

title: Microsoft Values $135 Billion Stake in OpenAI as Firms Face Legal Pressure
contentSnippet: The recapitalization gives OpenAI freedom to partner with competitors and release open-weight models, even as both firms face legal pressure.

title: Bitwise's Solana ETF Draws $69.5M on Debut, Outpacing Rival Fund's Launch
contentSnippet: The strong early inflows suggest institutions are favoring Bitwise’s direct staking model as Solana ETFs start gaining traction.

title: Australia classifies stablecoins, wrapped tokens as financial products in updated guidance
contentSnippet: Under new guidance, companies would need to obtain a license to offer products such as stablecoins and wrapped tokens.

title: Tom Lee’s BitMine adds $113 million worth of ETH to treasury: onchain data
contentSnippet: BitMine's Monday disclosure revealed that its treasury holdings have surpassed 3.3 million ETH, worth over $13 billion.

title: World Liberty Financial to distribute 8.4 million WLFI for early USD1 adopters
contentSnippet: The distribution rewards users who earned points by trading USD1 pairs on partner exchanges and maintaining USD1 balances.

title: OpenAI Reveals Over 1 Million ChatGPT Users Discuss Suicide Weekly
contentSnippet: OpenAI says it’s strengthening suicide crisis safeguards, but a former researcher says the fixes don’t go far enough.

title: Humanoid Race Heats Up as 1X Unveils Talking Home Robot Helper NEO
contentSnippet: Analysts expect the humanoid and service-robot markets to exceed $300 billion within the next decade as companies continue to forge ahead.

title: Australia’s Financial Regulator Flags Broader Oversight of Crypto Under Updated Guidance
contentSnippet: The final guidance expands last year’s draft, adding new examples and custody rules as ASIC shifts from proposals to enforceable oversight.

title: Visa adding support for four stablecoins on four unique blockchains, as spend quadrupled last quarter
contentSnippet: CEO Ryan McInerney also noted that his company has started enabling banks to mint and burn their own stablecoins.

title: Sam Altman Confronts Backlash Over GPT-5 Rollout, Unveils Expanding Vision During AMA
contentSnippet: The OpenAI CEO admitted the company mishandled the GPT-5 upgrade and said adults deserve freer tools.

title: AI Backlash Is Here: Even Sophisticated Users Are Getting Sick of Tech's Latest Obsession
contentSnippet: Forced AI software features are stirring real user frustration, while studies on fatigue are piling up. Is a full-blown revolt in our future?

title: Ethereum’s Fusaka hard fork activates on final testnet ahead of mainnet launch
contentSnippet: Hoodi represents the third and final testnet deployment, following successive activations on Holesky and Sepolia earlier this month.
